preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored DropTable for EXTERNAL_SYSTEM_TASK as table does not exist.

createTable.remarks: Configuration details for a scheduled task to poll external systems

column.name: TASK_ID
column.remarks: The scheduled task that this configuration applies to.

column.name: COMMS_URL
column.remarks: The URL of the web service to poll.

column.name: TIMEOUT
column.remarks: Period of time to wait if no response from synchronous web service call.

column.name: INTERVAL
column.remarks: Period of time to wait between web service calls.

column.name: USERNAME
column.remarks: The username to access the web service.

column.name: PASSSWORD
column.remarks: The password to access the web service.

column.name: ADDITIONAL_PARAMETERS
column.remarks: The Additional Parameters for the external system.

column.name: EXTERNAL_PARAMETERS
column.remarks: The External Parameters to set in the external system.

createTable.remarks: Configuration details for a scheduled task to poll external systems

column.name: IS_ACTIVE
column.remarks: Whether this token is active or archived. (This flag is '1' if it is active and '0' if archived.)

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: The name of the JSON Token.

column.name: COMMS_URL
column.remarks: The URL of the connecting web service.

column.name: JSON_TOKEN
column.remarks: The JSON token used to authenicate the external system.

column.name: TOKEN_EXPIRY
column.remarks: The utc time that the external system token expires.

column.name: LAST_CONNECTION
column.remarks: The utc time the external system connected.

column.name: ROLES
column.remarks: The roles associated with the token.
